file_explorer.title: File Explorer
file_explorer.desc:
- A custom-built web-based file explorer inspired by Windows Explorer.
- It can list and organize drives like `A:`, `C:`, and `F:`, sort them alphabetically, and display folder contents dynamically.
- The browser version mimics the layout and functionality of a real file explorer, while the `Node.js` backend version can access and fetch actual directories and files.
- The project includes sorting, path navigation, and file info display — designed to look and feel like a native Windows 11 file manager!

quick_notes.title: Quick Notes
quick_notes.desc:
## Definition
- **Quick Notes** is a lightweight and fast note-taking web app that supports Markdown-like syntax (e.g. `**bold**`, `*italic*`, `---` for dividers) and automatically renders it into styled HTML while keeping entity encoding safe.
- It's built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focusing on simplicity, speed, and offline functionality. Notes are displayed in a clean interface with responsive design and subtle animations.
- Each note is stored locally, can include formatting, and the app ensures that raw content remains secure by sanitizing user input before rendering.
## Key features
- Markdown-like syntax rendering (`**bold**`, `*italic*`, `# Heading`, etc.).
- Safe HTML entity encoding (prevents injection).
- Offline, client-side data handling with `localStorage`.
- Smooth, minimal UI with focus on readability.
- Responsive layout and theme-friendly design.

weather_app.title: Weather App
weather_app.desc:
## Definition
This app is a beautifully designed weather app that provides accurate, real-time weather information for any location worldwide.
With a sleek interface and smooth animations, you can instantly view the current temperature, humidity, wind speed, and more — all powered by reliable weather data sources.

## Features

- Real-time temperature and condition updates
- Hourly and daily forecasts
- Interactive charts for temperature trends
- Auto-detection of user location
- Fast and responsive design
